description: The problem is a RecursionError caused by a setdefault function. When a program attempts to set the default value of a dictionary using the setdefault() function, the program enters an infinite loop and causes a RecursionError. The setdefault() function is not able to set the default
code:
# Create a dictionary with some initial values 
my_dict = {'a':1, 'b':2, 'c':3}

# Use setdefault to add a new key-value pair
my_dict.setdefault('d', 4)
